name: CallToPost
0:
”Alexa, start the horse race”
”Alexa, begin the horse race”
”Alexa, run the horse race”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the horse race
des: This skill will play the famous bugle music that starts just about every horse race. Use when & where it's needed... you'll be surprised how often that is. And they're off!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
